testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join a community of artists who love creating with our AI.

items.name: Emily Carter
items.comment: The AI Art Generator allowed me to create amazing pieces for my portfolio that I never could have imagined!

items.name: David Lee
items.comment: I was blown away by the quality of art generated from my simple prompts. It's a true innovation!

items.name: Jessica Thompson
items.comment: This tool has opened up new avenues for my artistic expression. Highly recommend it!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about the AI Art Generator

items.title: What types of artwork can I create?
items.description: You can generate a variety of artwork styles, including landscapes, portraits, and abstract designs tailored to your prompts.

items.title: Is there a limit to how many artworks I can create?
items.description: Each user receives 50 free credits daily, allowing you to experiment with countless creations. Additional credits can be earned through sharing and community engagement.

items.title: Can I use the generated art commercially?
items.description: Yes! Users with a subscription can use generated artworks for commercial purposes. Free-tier users can enjoy personal use of their creations.

items.title: How is my privacy maintained?
items.description: All art generation processes occur within your browser, ensuring that no images are stored or uploaded to external servers.

footer.heading: Ready to Turn Imagination into Art?
footer.description: Try the AI Art Generator now and see your ideas come to life. No sign-up required.
